name: Clonk
languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

traits.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, Clonk has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

traits.name: Mimicry
entries: The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Hellfire Warhammer
entries: Melee atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8 damage) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d10 + 1 damage) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
